attributes.action: Demand exclusion of Russia from the Paralympics or withdraw the British team.
attributes.additional_details: It is unreasonable to expect individual athletes to make this decision, it needs to be included in our national effort to isolate and sanction the Putin regime.
attributes.background: Demand the exclusion of the Russian team from the 2022 Winter Paralympics and, if this is not achieved, withdraw the UK team.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about the organisation of the Olympics are a matter for the International Olympic Committee, and decisions about the UK's participation in the Olympics are a matter for the National Olympic Committee for Great Britain and Northern Ireland, not the UK Government or Parliament.
